measurements_data.comments: OD: Calculated based on the sum of other treatment/disposal options subtracted from total waste generated; SLF: 16; Estimated based on the amount of waste taken to one sanitary landfill in Las Placetas, San Jose de las Matas; RE: Includes all exported recyclables (metals, paper, carton, plastics, and glass); does not include items recycled in country; Other: Calculated based on the amount of waste from HH without collection services compared to total waste generation
